channel.description: Recent content in Java on Eunhan's library

item.title: [JAVA code]Lexicographical order
item.description: Time complexity : \(O(n\;log\;n)\) Space complexity : \(O(1)\) Collections.sort(List<String>_values);Arrays.sort(String[]array); Time complexity : \(O(n^2)\) Space complexity : \(O(1)\) public static String[] LexicalOrder(String[] words) { int n = words.length(); for(int i = 0; i < n-1; ++i) { for (int j = i + 1; j < n; ++j) { if (words[i].compareTo(words[j]) > 0) { String temp = words[i]; words[i] = words[j]; words[j] = temp; } } } }

item.title: [JAVA]Lexicographical order
item.description: Time complexity : \(O(n\;log\;n)\) Space complexity : \(O(1)\) Collections.sort(List<String>_values);Arrays.sort(String[]array); Time complexity : \(O(n^2)\) Space complexity : \(O(1)\) public static String[] LexicalOrder(String[] words) { int n = words.length(); for(int i = 0; i < n-1; ++i) { for (int j = i + 1; j < n; ++j) { if (words[i].compareTo(words[j]) > 0) { String temp = words[i]; words[i] = words[j]; words[j] = temp; } } } }
